title: 6-Month Impact Assessment
description: Evaluate the long-term impact of AI training on your work and career after 6 months.

questions.question: How deeply integrated is AI into your daily workflow?
On average, how much time does AI save you per week?
How would you rate the return on investment of taking this AI course?
Describe specific measurable outcomes or achievements you've accomplished using AI
questions.placeholder: Examples: completed projects faster, improved quality metrics, cost savings, new capabilities...

questions.question: Have you shared AI knowledge or tools with your team or organization?
If yes, describe how you've helped others leverage AI
questions.placeholder: Share how you've trained others, created workflows, or championed AI adoption...

questions.question: Which advanced AI topics are you interested in learning more about?
What obstacles or barriers still prevent you from using AI more effectively?
questions.placeholder: Describe technical, organizational, or other challenges...

questions.question: Overall, how satisfied are you with your AI learning journey?
